author: smarru
msg: further cleaning of logging dependencies, the test cases could have used the sl4j-simple, but ensuring all of airavata modules use log4j and any appenders specified. Dropping in slf4j-jcl for routing any dependency logging based on jcl or commons-logging.

when getting an Ev2 commit editor from the RA layer.
